Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: This is not really an issue. Â That command is designed to be piped to a file for use as a man page

Action.author: latitiah
Action.body: It would be helpful to state this in the help description when the --help-man option is mentioned. I assumed that the help-man option was going to be the equivalent of accessing the man page for this tool.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: It's a built-in function of the library being used so not sure we can actually make any changes there
